whoAmI.title: Who am I?
whoAmI.description: I am a developer passionate about creating modern and performant web applications. My expertise covers the entire web stack, from front-end to back-end.

skills.title: My skills
skills.description: React, TypeScript, Node.js, Python, and much more. I constantly strive to learn new technologies to stay at the forefront of innovation.

approach.title: My approach
approach.description: I favor a user-centered approach, creating intuitive interfaces and exceptional user experiences.

projects.title: My projects
projects.description: I have worked on various projects, from web applications to enterprise solutions, focusing on code quality and performance.

descriptions.resumify: Creation of a website for online CV creation

contact.title: Let's talk
contact.subtitle: I'm always looking for new opportunities

testimonials.title: Still not convinced that I'm the one who will save humanity with my undeniable and absolutely mind-blowing skills?

1.quote: Working with this developer was like having a superhero on our team. They didn't just write code, they saved the world one function at a time!
1.name: John Smith
1.title: CTO at TechSaviors Inc.

2.quote: I've never seen someone debug with such precision. It's like they have X-ray vision for code!
2.name: Sarah Johnson
2.title: Lead Developer at CodeCraft

3.quote: They don't just solve problems, they prevent them from existing in the first place. It's like having a time machine for bugs!
3.name: Michael Chen
3.title: Product Manager at FutureTech

4.quote: Their code is so clean, it makes Marie Kondo look like a hoarder!
4.name: Emma Davis
4.title: Senior Developer at CleanCode

5.quote: I'm pretty sure they can speak binary. The way they optimize code is just... otherworldly!
5.name: Alex Rivera
5.title: Tech Lead at BinaryBusters

footer.text: If you love palm trees and llamas, we'll be friends
